layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus, Sav -- ior, pi -- lot me O -- ver life's tem -- pes -- tuous sea; Un -- known waves be -- fore me roll, Hid -- ing rock and treach -- 'rous shoal; Chart and com -- pass come from Thee; Je -- sus, Sav -- ior, pi -- lot me.

lyrics.stanza: As a mother stills her child, Thou canst hush the ocean wild; Boist'rous waves obey Thy will When Thou say'st to them, "Be still." Wondrous Sov'reign of the sea, Jesus, Savior, pilot me.
Though death's valley I may pass, Still Thy grace will fear surpass; In Thy presence I will rest, And, while leaning on Thy breast, I will hear Thee say to me, "Fear not, I will pilot thee."
